channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Galaxy Store
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Galaxy Store

item.title: CVE-2023-42581|2024-08-28T18:22:36.655Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper URL validation from InstantPlay deeplink in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.64.4 allows attackers to execute JavaScript API to access data.

item.title: CVE-2024-20870|2024-08-01T22:06:36.617Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.71.8 allows local attackers to write arbitrary files with the privilege of Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2024-20870|2024-06-04T17:40:12.057Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.71.8 allows local attackers to write arbitrary files with the privilege of Galaxy Store.
